name: Touhou Love of Whispers
description:
A simple RPG based on Touhou Project starring Meiling and Sakuya going on an adventure together with an Undertale inspired combat system. This was made for the Touhou Pride Jam 4.  

This was my first time making a project this ambitious and trying a lot of things like learning how to make bullet patterns. I am quite happy with what I accomplished however messy it may be. I struggled the most with the music as I'm still new to composing but I tried my best. Apologies if its hard to listen to haha! Please let me know what you think!
